attributes.action: Aggressively prosecute ALL those listed in the chain of custody of missing or stolen laptops and personal data in the care of the Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's about time every level of Government had a taste of what they're shovelling down the throats of small business and forced to protect our data by making an example of those who are too lazy to follow proper procedure in handling sensitive documents. Prosecute all those found in the chain of custody, listed or not, of all documents, computer hardware, CDROM-based data, etc., which finds its way outside of proper channels.
